title: Is there any Yorick skin planned (are you even allowed to talk about this, dear Rito?)
body:
I play Yorick since forever, and I love the rework, it really preserved the soul of Yorick while making him less toxic, however the fact stays that Yorick has got no skins for 6 years.

I recently bought Undertaker Yorick, but honestly even after rework both Yorick skins are pretty "meh". It's not that the artist did bad job, it's just that those skins don't really have much going on in them. They are both pretty, but at the same time they don't really feel like you have your champion skinned.

Poppy got an uber-cool skin soon after her rework, can Yorick player hope for _anything_ finally too? I know there are a few of us, but still, Yorick only has release skins after 6 years.

replies.body:
Hey 2bad2badger! 

In our recent [State of Skins](http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2017/05/dev-state-of-skins/) post, we committed to making new skins for several champions in the upcoming months, including Yorick. That's all the info we're sharing at the moment, but we'll be able to share more when it comes time to put him on PBE! :)
Do I sound too much as a cry baby if I ask: "what about {{champion:136}}?"
We haven't officially announced if something is or isn't in the works, so I've got nothin' to share at the moment. Sorry!

People keep posting this like it suddenly makes the last six years ok or something. Remember we were promised Dragon Master Swain...twice. At the end of the day Riot has and will say a lot of things but whether or not they actually do it is the important thing.

Honestly,Riot got a lot better at promising things.

I mean we were promised the reworks for {{champion:3}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:44}} and we got them.
We were promised to get {{champion:136}} in 2016 and we got him.

When was the last time they didn't deliver something that they promised?

Also from what I recall they only said they were working on Dragonmaster swain(or that they wanted to make him),but didn't promise him.
Sion got his first post rework skin after over a year and a half. Gangplank first post VGU skin was Dreadnova, which was over a year after his VGU too.
Nope. GP's  Captain Gankplank  skin came out with his   rework.

I've read online the idea for a gardener Yorick, credit to some guy named Cheesyleeks, where his ghouls are replaced with bees and he throws honey at people with his E to attract the bees to swarm and his ult summoned the queen bee. If that came into reality i might cry.
They said in the Skin Dev Blog that Yorick, among many other champions will get a skin within the next 12 months.

Riot said that they will care now about champs that get no skins for a long time, but they wait until they got there reworked  to make the skin much better. So I guess we will see a Yorick skin this year ( not arcade Yorick, the leak was a fake)
There was a recent leak, not sure if it was true, but if it was then yes yorick will be getting one.

It reasently got leaked that a arcade Yorik is in development (I'd love me some shovelknight), though nothing is confirmed. Also if the leak was real it is probably early in development, so it is posible that it gets canceled.
